result.name: caseman
result.notes: Case management system for county court cases. Details include name, sex and address of applicant, children's date of birth if applicable, names of respondants, details of  solicitors if applicable, whether further documents involved and type of Order.

organization.name: ministry-of-justice
organization.title: Ministry of Justice
organization.description:
We work to protect the public and reduce reoffending, and to provide a more effective, transparent and responsive criminal justice system for victims and the public.

MOJ is a ministerial department, supported by 37 agencies and public bodies.

https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/ministry-of-justice

result.title: CaseMan (County Court  Case management system)

extras.value: The following statistical publications are made using data from this source: Judicial and Court Statistics; Court Statistics Quarterly; Mortgage and Landlord Possession Statistics.
